title: Knoppix 5.1.0 DVD Screensaver for Microsoft Windows
description:
A Live Linux expressed as a screensaver for Microsoft Windows.

The original comes from http://knopper.net/ ; this version you can &#039;autoplay&#039; under Windows by putting the DVD in; you can install as a screensaver in the usual way; or you can tell your computer to &#039;boot&#039; from the DVD and then it runs the way Klaus Knopper intended it to.

To end the screensaver version, Ctrl-Alt-F and click on the red X.
